food.name: pheasant
food.description: 1 pheasant will serve 2 normal eaters, or 1 hearty eater.

food.name: Venison
food.description: Better than beef and better for you too! Our traditional family Christmas Eve dinner menu is always venison steak and shrimp scampi!

food.name: Yellow Fin Tuna
food.description: Get this all-star, easy-to-follow Grilled Yellow Fin Tuna with Grilled Pineapple Salsa recipe from The Essence of Emeril.

food.name: Eclipse
food.description: Instantised Whole Milk Powder which makes mixing up some blue top as easy as possible. Ideal for those who are not able to duck to the dairy.

food.name: Ricotta Tartlet
food.description: Get this all-star, easy-to-follow Berry Ricotta Tartlets recipe from Giada De Laurentiis.

food.name: Amouse Bouche Yukon Potato Applewood Smoked Bacon Soup
food.description: Shrimp Mousse with Yukon Potato Tuille and Blackberry-bacon vinaigrette.

food.name: Mini Olive Rosemary Baguette
food.description: They come in a resealable pouch, but they rarely last long enough to need it.
